channel.title: Joy Behar on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Joy Behar on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: White House Calls ‘The View’s’ Joy Behar an “Irrelevant Loser” After She Says Trump’s “Jealous of Obama”
item.description: Behar’s comments came after Trump accused his predecessor, Obama, of “treason” and trying to rig the 2016 and 2020 elections.

item.title: White House Calls ‘The View’s’ Joy Behar an “Irrelevant Loser” After She Says Trump’s “Jealous of Obama”
item.description: Behar’s comments came after Trump accused his predecessor, Obama, of “treason” and trying to rig the 2016 and 2020 elections.

item.title: White House Attacks ‘The View’ After Joy Behar Says Trump Is Jealous of Obama: ‘Joy Is an Irrelevant Loser’ Who Should ‘Self-Reflect’ Before ‘Her Show Is the Next to Be Pulled Off Air’
item.description: A spokesperson for Donald Trump’s White House is attacking ABC’s “The View” after Joy Behar claimed on the July 23 episode that Trump is “jealous” of Barack Obama.

item.title: White House Attacks ‘The View’ After Joy Behar Says Trump Is Jealous of Obama: ‘Joy Is an Irrelevant Loser’ Who Should ‘Self-Reflect’ Before ‘Her Show Is the Next to Be Pulled Off Air’
item.description: A spokesperson for Donald Trump’s White House is attacking ABC’s “The View” after Joy Behar claimed on the July 23 episode that Trump is “jealous” of Barack Obama.
